sentences.en: The fiery right-wing leader toned down his militant statements after the meeting.
sentences.cn: 这位言辞激烈的右翼领导人在会后缓和了他的好战言辞。

sentences.en: Militant mine workers in the Ukraine have voted for a one-day stoppage next month.
sentences.cn: 在乌克兰，激进的煤矿工人们已经投票决定在下个月进行一天的罢工。

sentences.en: Saif looked less like a hedge funder and more like a fist-pumping militant in fatigues.
sentences.cn: 赛义夫看起来不太像一个对冲基金经理，而更像一个穿着迷彩服挥舞拳头的激进分子。
